channel.title: openwrt on redbunny
channel.description: Recent content in openwrt on redbunny

item.title: Openwrt主路由使用端口回流失效
item.description: Openwrt 解决方法 ssh连接openwrt系统后，编辑/etc/sysctl.d/11-br-netfilter.conf文件。 net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-arptables=0 net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-ip6tables=0 net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-iptables=0 保证为后面的赋
